Topic.Title: Trying to set custom background image

Posts.EditableText: I'm using the game book layout and want to add a custom image for the background, just a simple image of old looking paper to go with the setting of the game. I can't seem to find any option other than changing the background colour.
Posts.HTML: I'm using the game book layout and want to add a custom image for the background, just a simple image of old looking paper to go with the setting of the game. I can't seem to find any option other than changing the background colour.
